document_data.name: ''Darth Thorn Horn''
document_data.author: [[Mydantha Marlest]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Darth Thorn Horn''''' was a stage play penned by [[Mydantha Marlest|Mydantha "Ladyminstrel" Marlest]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: ''Darth Thorn Horn'' was a play of at least three acts and featured the characters named Old Duke Steeljaws, and Morold the Mad Knight. The play was first performed in the {{YearlinkName|1375}}.
